thread.title: Court Construes Claims Directed to Data Communication Application
thread.title_full: Court Construes Claims Directed to Data Communication Application

author: Morris James LLP
title: Court Construes Claims Directed to Data Communication Application
text:
Court Construes Claims Directed to Data Communication Application more+ Contact 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: <iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=c1ceadb1-3acf-45f7-8180-12b5ff251a80" width="100%" height="620" frameborder="1" style="border: 2px solid #ccc; overflow-x:hidden !important; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="auto"></iframe> 
Andrews, J. Claim construction opinion. 
The Court construed the following claim terms found in U.S. Patent Nos. 6,256,398 and 6,819,776: pixel value(s) said pattern of pixels constituting a foreground visual image that conveys [recognizable]/[understandable] information to an observer binary value(s) determining binary values via comparing pixel values of selected pixels to the pixel values of pixels neighboring thereto receiving light from a display address information 
DISCLAIMER: Because of the generality of this update, the information provided herein may not be applicable in all situations and should not be acted upon without specific legal advice based on particular situations.
